text: Nɨbi pel God ayɨp agɨlɨg, nop suk agɨlɨg Bapi apɨm. Bapi nɨm ak, ne binɨb adɨp adɨp mɨdebal ak nɨŋɨd, kɨlop anɨgɨl tɨg asɨkup. Pen kɨli gɨpal gɨpal tek nep nɨŋɨd, tɨg asɨk bɨlokup. Anɨb ak mɨñɨl lum awl mɨdebɨm won ak, nɨbi binɨb man ke okok nɨb ju apɨl mɨdebal tek mɨdɨl, God ne bɨ jel gup ak nop nɨŋɨd, muk okok yenɨmɨb.
